detail_desc: Socks in soft, fine-knit organic cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Soft terry inside.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric, a lined hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and side sections. Partly lined.
Aviator-style sunglasses with a decoration on one side. Metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short dungaree dress in imitation suede with adjustable straps that fasten with press-studs and a visible zip down the front. Lined at the top.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable hood, a stand-up collar, zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and inner jersey ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Reflective details. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
